metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29133 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Lack of verification in haserl, a component of Alpine Linux Configuration Framework, before 0.9.36 allows local users to read the contents of any file on the filesystem.

notes.Note: sbeattie> haserl was setuid root on alpine linux. this is not the case in debian/ubuntu.

criterions.comment: haserl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
